name: Skyline Deluxe Room | 1 King
description: Upgraded king room in the Skyline Tower featuring enhanced furnishings, one king-size bed, High Definition TV, in-room safe, high-speed Wi-Fi, refreshment center, mini-refrigerator, and complimentary coffee. An elevated stay experience in the heart of the Eldorado.
shortDescription: Upgraded king room in the Skyline Tower with enhanced furnishings and amenities.

meta.title: Skyline Deluxe Room 1 King – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Skyline Deluxe King Room at Eldorado Resort Reno – upgraded accommodations with enhanced amenities.

testimonials.quote: Visited Skyline Deluxe Room | 1 King during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Rebecca R.

testimonials.quote: Skyline Deluxe Room | 1 King was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Adam P.
